climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: GENTLE ON BABY SKIN: Doctor Butler’s hypoallergenic baby wipes have been developed by a physician to provide gentle cleansing wipes for your newborn baby. The organic cloth makes them safe to use on your baby’s delicate skin and are newborn essential must haves.*

SOFT BAMBOO WIPES: Use less with our extra thick and large organic baby wipes that leave no residue behind and are mess free. Doctor Butler’s sensitive baby wipes feature natural essential oils like chamomile extract and calendula that are safe for baby as well as mom.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Doctor Butler's Organic Wipes are safe to use every day. Moisturize and soothe with every wipe! Our organic wipes are infused with botanicals, plant based ingredients and are Hypo-allergenic. Doctor Butler's are made with ultra soft organic bamboo, medical grade cloth. No more worries about sensitive skin, we're the only wipes you and the entire family will ever need!

Doctor Butler's Organic Soothing Wipes are the Only True Organic, Chemical-Free Wipes Use Less Wipes to be Cost Effective Our Extra Large and Thick Wipes get the job done Faster and Easier The Only Organic, Chemical-Free Wipes Available! Great for babies, makeup removal and personal hygiene Safe to use as often as needed. Free of Alcohol and Witch Hazel Free of Chemicals and Artificial Preservatives Safe for the Environment

Manufacturered Free of petrochemicals, chlorine or chemicals, alcohol, phthalates, formaldehyde carriers, parabens, phenols, quaternary ammonium compounds, SLS or lanolin. Preservative Free Quality Ingredients Doctor Butler’s Soothing Wipes consists of 100% Organic Bamboo Cloth, Filtered Water, Vitamin E (Non-Synthetic Tocopherols), Rosemary Oil Extract, Lysine, Calendula Officinalis, Chamomilla Recutita, Sodium Citrate, Betaine

A Manufacturer that Cares Our manufacturer has the highest level of certification and awards demonstrating their pride and commitment to quality. This includes being the “best in class” in safety records, excellent working environment, efficient practices and sustainability. No Animal Testing Doctor Butler’s products are never tested on animals and contain no animal by-products!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing safe wipes. Healthy and good on sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: First off I will say I searched endlessly for the right wipes for me and my super super sensitives skin. I am not being compensated for this review. But this is a product I am passionate about. And you do have to be careful pulling them out that they don’t all clump together like others said. And that you seal them good every time.I use these for so many things. I’m so grateful these exist. To wipe the eye burgers off my dog. To take my makeup off when I’m lazy. To wipe down after a workout. They don’t bother my skin. I originally was looking for a safe pre/post intimacy wipe. And everything out there was loaded with chemicals. With over bearing scents. These are barely fragrant which I like. I think they are helping prevent me from my constant UTIs. I even use them after I wash my sex toys. These do not irritate me at all I actually like them enough to subscribe. I’m really glad a holistic wipe like this exists. Yes they are pricier than others but they are so much healthier for your body.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle wipes for all uses
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are great! Gentle and soothing for my red painful skin. Great for bathroom use also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TOP notch ingredients for perfectly balanced skin all over the body.
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are phenomenal. They’re the best I’ve ever used. I truly feel like the quality of the ingredients is so high. I’ve now replaced so many of the products in my beauty arsenal and bathroom in general with the simplicity and efficiency of these. I especially have discovered how useful these are to remove my makeup. My face feels so rejuvenated and fresh after using these. I have very finicky skin and basically all it can tollerate is micellar water. I dont’t use makeup that often and only rinse my face with water in the shower, and since doing that my skin is the best it’s ever been. But these wipes make my skin feel PERFECT and so balanced. My skin literally sings after I use these and I can’t explain how good the feeling is. My skin has improved just from using these occasionally.Also, very balancing for the sensitive areas we wipe with. I now understand the meaning of balanced skin! I can feel the deliciousness of organic ingredients and how much my skin appreciates it. Just top notch ingredients, experience, and product. I never leave reviews but this one I couldn’t let pass unsung!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Prefer over Seventh Generation
reviews.reviewText: I like having body wipes on hand to freshen up with if I'm out somewhere or otherwise can't shower. I bought these after trying Seventh Generation baby wipes and not caring for them. So I will be comparing the two a bit.These have a slightly medicinal scent I don't super care for, but it dissipates quickly. I will take it over the 'baby wipe' smell of Seventh Generation however. Those say "0% Fragrance" (not "no added fragrance" or "fragrance free" which I know means the same thing) but the ingredients definitely produce a heavy scent, just not as 'chemically' as conventional wipes.I also like that the ingredients in Doctor Butler's are simpler than Seventh Gen. Seventh Gen is a good option over conventional wipes but they do contain plastic as well as a few other ingredients I wasn't already familiar with and had to check out. Doc Butler's wipes are plastic free and actually made of organic NON RAYON bamboo cloth. There has been some greenwashing regarding bamboo going on (I'm looking at you Boody!) and I urge everyone to research bamboo viscose/rayon before buying anything made of it. Furthermore I just personally like the ingredients in Doc Butler's wipes are easy to understand and I didn't have to spend a lot of time evaluating the product before purchase.Both wipes are about the size of a tissue, Doc Butler's being slightly larger. They're equally thick (thin?) and strong, and both left lint in some places which I think is just a general wipe problem. Since Seventh Gen's are specifically meant for babies they have ducks and leaves on them because you know, babies care about that sort of thing. I don't mind having both form and function in some situations, but on a wipe (or toilet paper for that matter) it just seems silly. Being an all purpose wipe, Doctor Butler's are plain.Both come in plastic packaging, which I'm not sure can be helped since they are wet. However Doc Butler's have the press and seal lid, while Seventh Gen has a flip top. I would expect Seventh Gen's closure to better preserve the wipes, but I can't be sure since I bought the brands at separate times. I will say that after a few months and about half the package the Seventh Gen ones are drying out. Though if you are using these as actual baby wipes you'll probably use them up before that happens.Design wise Doc Butler's is unassuming, while Seventh Gen's is typical baby wipe cute packaging complete with image of a baby. It's fine for the purpose, but another reason I prefer Doc Butler's general body wipe to a baby wipe, even if both can do the same job. As someone currently without children I can leave Doc Butler's out in my bathroom or carry it in a bag without people asking questions lol.Overall, both are good choices for a cleansing wipe. But personally I'll take Doctor Butler's and leave the baby wipes for the babies!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Best of all wipes
reviews.reviewText: Love this the only wipe that is gentle and works

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolute BEST out there in every category!!
reviews.reviewText: I really, really hope these are restocked soon!! They are absolutely perfect! They have a wonderfully effective list of organic ingredients and materials without any of the bad stuff that other companies claim they just "have to" put in their wipes. They are also durable, soft, and smell subtly pleasant. Baby loves them - giggling when they are used - and likes to hold them and play with them. We use them all day long for hand wiping, diaper changes, spit-up cleaning, face/chin/neck wiping, etc., etc. I am positive we will keep plenty of these around for many years to come.The company told us they will be restocking these soon. Our household anxiously awaits their return :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work great: made of bamboo, are organic, and don't tear!!
reviews.reviewText: I really like these wipes. I use them every day as an adult wipe.I love that they are organic and made of bamboo.A little disappointed that there are imported ingredients. Really wanted a product with all USA ingredients, but glad they are made in the USA.The wipes work well, compared to most other wipes. They don't tear, or my fingers don't poke a hole in them! Grabbing just one at a time sometimes doesn't happen, but it is usually 2 wipes and not a whole glob of them. Using them is a breeze, doesn't easily roll or bunch up. I found the best way for me to use them is to wipe in one direction, and not up and down (like I am used to doing).These are the only wipes I use, and I get them every month on Subscribe and Save. Definitely recommend!
